title: Mobile operators : carrier market shares in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Mobile Carrier in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and lowest at Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Mobile Carrier is 27.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Mobile Carrier, and Market share in each Mobile Carrier on the y axis.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Mobile Carrier in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and lowest at Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Mobile Carrier is 27.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 9 number of Mobile Carriers.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.
Mobile Carrier O2 has the second highest value for Market share.
The lowest value at Mobile Carrier Talk Talk is 28.0x times less than the highest value at BT (including EE).
Market share at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) is 28.0 , second place is O2 at 26.0, and thirdly is Vodafone at 21.0.
Mobile Carrier Talk Talk, iD Mobile, and Sky have the same Market share.
The highest value 28.0 at BT (including EE) is almost 2.52 times larger than the average value 11.11.
The Market share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Mobile Carriers.
